Package net.sf.jguiraffe.transform

Class AbstractTransformerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jguiraffe.transform.AbstractTransformerTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestDateTransformerBase, TestDoubleTransformer, TestIntegerTransformer, TestLongTransformer, TestRequiredValidator
    public abstract class AbstractTransformerTest
extends Object
    A base class for testing transformers. This class provides some common functionality for tests of Transformer implementations. It especially maintains some mock objects for the transformer context and the validation message handler. It is possible to expect specific error messages.
    Version:
    $Id: AbstractTransformerTest.java 205 2012-01-29 18:29:57Z oheger $
    Author:
    Oliver Heger

      • setUpContextMock

        protected void setUpContextMock​(Map<String,​Object> props)
        Creates mock objects for the transformer context and the message validation handler.
        Parameters:
        props - the properties to be returned by the context mock (can be null, then an empty map will be used)

      • replayMocks

        Replays the mock objects.

      • expectError

        protected void expectError​(String errorKey,
                           Object... params)
        Initializes the mock objects to expect an error code.
        Parameters:
        errorKey - the key of the error message
        params - additional parameters for the error message

      • checkError

        protected void checkError​(String errorKey,
                          ValidationResult vr)
        Tests whether the specified validation result object contains the expected error message.
        Parameters:
        errorKey - the error key
        vr - the result object to check
